g.text: Adjacent cells differ by only one variable
Only one bit changes between adjacent
• Input combinations that never occur in the system
• Output values that don't affect system operation
• Represented by 'X' or 'd' in truth tables
• Can be treated as 0 or 1 for optimization
vs Without don't cares: F = ĀBC̄ + ĀBC + ABC
Step 2: Mark don't cares as X
• Use X as 1 if it helps grouping
• Use X as 0 if better for optimization
• X can be used in multiple groups
Don't care conditions must be truly "don't care" in your application.
If the system can reach these states, unpredictable behavior may occur.
